name: metric-regression
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
Regress spatial map out of a metric file.

For each regressor, its mean across the surface is subtracted from its data.  Each input map is then regressed against these, and a constant term.  The resulting regressed slopes of all regressors specified with -remove are multiplied with their respective regressor maps, and these are subtracted from the input map.

inputs.name: opt_roi_roi_metric
inputs.description: only regress inside an roi: the area to use for regression, as a metric

inputs.name: opt_column_column
inputs.description: select a single column to regress from: the column number or name

inputs.name: remove
inputs.description: specify a metric to regress out

type.name: remove
type.description: specify a metric to regress out

inputs.name: opt_remove_column_column
inputs.description: select a column to use, rather than all: the column number or name

inputs.name: keep
inputs.description: specify a metric to include in regression, but not remove

type.name: keep
type.description: specify a metric to include in regression, but not remove

inputs.name: opt_keep_column_column
inputs.description: select a column to use, rather than all: the column number or name
